name: Geeks in Saigon
description: Are you an entrepreneur? A developer? A designer? You have no idea what Saigon is all about! Saigon has been called the Pearl of the Far East. It's not just because it's beautiful, but this is the place of opportunities, where things happen and people make things happen. With more than 10 million population, people will not wear Facebook or Google shirt walking around downtown to identify themselves as geek. Let's come with us to the hidden garage of hottest startups in Saigon and checkout their projects!
